alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 1:56PM CDT until April 20 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 155 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Beaver, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Beaver... Urbanette... Grandview... Pleasant Ridge... Oak Hill... Busch... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
